amendment.description: An amendment numbered 98 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to designate $20 million for psychosocial support programs for religious and ethnic minorities persecuted by ISIS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A055) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A055) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Hastings.
